summary: Just a fairly small tweak to Lydia - changed her face and made her smaller.
descriptionHtml:
I know there are a million Lydia replacements out there but they either didn\'t work or I didn\'t like them so did this one just for me.

I\'ve tried to keep the sternness, and perhaps ruggedness, of features I might expect given her original appearance while making her somewhat cuter.

I\'ve also made her smaller (I like my women on the petite side), about 1.6m by my reckoning.

It\'s just a minor tweak to the original, vanilla character so it shouldn\'t cause any conflicts. This is, however, my first ever mod, so if it doesn\'t work, please let me know!


Installation:

Just put the \"LydiaByBob.esp\" file in the \"steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\" directory.


Recommended mod:

Lydia lips fix by ziher (http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11610)
author: Dr Caligineus
